sec.p: The oil extraction was obtained from 1 kg fresh plant by steam distillation during 3 h using a Clevenger-type apparatus [ 9]. The aqueous phase was extracted with dichloromethane (3 × 50 ml) and dried with anhydrous sodium sulphate (PubChem CID: 24,243). After filtration the solvent is eliminated by pressure distillation reduced in rotary evaporator and pure oil was stored at 4 °C in obscurity till the beginning of ClEO analysis. The amount of oil obtained from each plant material was calculated as:
Oil (% v/ w) = observed volume of oil (ml)/weight of sample (g) × 100.
The ClEO was solubilised in n-Hexane (PubChem CID: 8058) for gas chromatography and mass spectrometry analysis.
